entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 12:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: N 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
